title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (React/Next.js) that talks to a local Ollama instance; supports multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI for browsing, pulling, and chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin coroutines support and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app that wraps Ollama for macOS/Windows/Linux with model management UI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-napi
summary: Official Node-API native addon for high-performance tokenization and inference bindings.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that proxies to Ollama and adds session memory, markdown rendering, and voice input.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to deploy Ollama on EC2 g5.xlarge with CloudWatch, SSM, and spot auto-recovery.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async wrappers over the Ollama REST API with serde types.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands and thread isolation.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library with Finch-based HTTP client and GenServer-backed conversation memory for Phoenix apps.
